predicate.note: Frames file for 'detract' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: non-agentive
example.text: One group says [0] the futures contribute to stock market volatility ; the other contends that futures are a sideshow of speculation that [*T*-1] detracts from the stock market 's basic function of [*] raising capital .
example.arg: from the stock market 's basic function of [*] raising capital

example.name: with Arg0
example.text: Dealers suggest that the only positive news on the horizon that [*T*-1] could detract attention from equities transactions is September 's U.S. consumer price data .
